snippet: About one-third said the automatic cuts to military and domestic programs would have no effect on the economy one way or the other, according to a New York Times/CBS News poll.
lead_paragraph: About one-third said the automatic cuts to military and domestic programs would have no effect on the economy one way or the other, according to a New York Times/CBS News poll.

headline.main: Almost Half of Americans Say Budget Cuts Will Hurt Economy
headline.print_headline: Almost Half of Americans Say Budget Cuts Will Hurt Economy
